metadata.title: CVE-2017-7596 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
LibTIFF 4.0.7 has an "outside the range of representable values of typefloat" undefined behavior issue, which might allow remote attackers tocause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact via a crafted image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7596` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8').
